other_tests.findings: A germline mutation of the VHL gene and loss of heterozygosity on the VHL gene locus in 3p were detected in the meningioma. Additional bands were shown at exon 3 in lymphocyte DNA. A point mutation changing cytosine to guanine at nucleotide number 685 was identified.
Showed additional bands at exon 3 in lymphocyte DNA from the patient and his son.
Both the hemangioblastoma and the meningioma showed loss of heterozygosity on chromosome 3p and the meningioma showed partial loss on 22q.
The intraoperative diagnosis was meningioma for the extra-axial tumor and capillary hemangioblastoma for the intra-axial tumor.
